author: April
content:
"I have not taken anything that I could show here today."

No? My day felt like a bust, too. So I'm very interested in "The Good, the Bad and the Ugly" from the work of other photographers. Maybe I should start such a series on my blog... ðŸ™‚

This image is such a poignant juxtaposition of the use and clearing of trees in our land, with a perfect title to point the way.
